name: ecom-api
description: E-commerce Microservices API with Redis and RabbitMQ

scripts.build: tsc && tsc-alias && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:configs
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/server.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node dist/server.js
scripts.start:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node dist/server.js
scripts.start:pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/server.js && sudo env PATH=$PATH:/usr/bin pm2 startup systemd -u root --hp /root && pm2 save
scripts.restart:pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart dist/server.js
scripts.start:pm2:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging pm2 start dist/server.js && sudo env PATH=$PATH:/usr/bin pm2 startup systemd -u root --hp /root && pm2 save
scripts.restart:pm2:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging pm2 restart dist/server.js
